video.title: Super 4
video.synopsis: Follow the daring adventures of Alex the knight, Ruby the pirate, Agent Gene and Twinkle the fairy as they travel through Playmobil-inspired worlds.

episodes.synopsis: Just hours before combating a gigantic opponent, Alex gets shrunk; Ruby's flattered when aliens worship her -- until they prepare her for sacrifice.
episodes.title: A Colossal Challenge / The Prophecy

episodes.synopsis: Dr. X's new 3D sculpture camera malfunctions and makes doubles of our heroes; Twinkle saves the day when the Dark Baron tries to capture the castle.
episodes.title: Negative / The Siege

episodes.synopsis: The castle is invaded by a strange fog that seems to swallow up the knights; Sharkbeard is after Dr. X's giant robot designed to clean Technopolis.
episodes.title: Fog Over Kingsland / Cleaning Day

episodes.synopsis: When Dr. X visits King Kenric, Alex and his pals must chase away a pesky ghost; the Chameleon has run out of fuel, so Gene sneaks into Dr. X's tower.
episodes.title: Haunted Castle / Gene's Four

episodes.synopsis: Sharkbeard accidentally blows up Gunpowder Island and wakes the volcano; Ruby is falsely accused of stealing the Fairy Queen's precious necklace.
episodes.title: The Final Countdowns / A Pirate's Honor

episodes.synopsis: An elf tries to repay our heroes for saving his life, but his kindness backfires; the Grand Fairy entrusts Twinkle and her pals with her spell book.
episodes.title: Your Wish Is My Command / Spell Book in Danger

episodes.synopsis: Twinkle enters a magic tournament, hoping to reverse the frog spell on the Fairy Queen; the Dark Baron lures our heroes into a hungry ogre's cave.
episodes.title: The Golden Wand / Appetite for Destruction

episodes.synopsis: Alex and his friends track down dragons that attacked King Kenric's castle; Dr. X's monkey casts a spell on himself with Twinkle's wand and gets huge.
episodes.title: Dragonriders / The Great Gonk

episodes.synopsis: Leonora plans to marry the Black Baron, and Alex, Ruby and Gene try to stop her; Twinkle helps three fairies fix some damage caused by a cranky gnome.
episodes.title: Princely Wedding / The Furious Elf

episodes.synopsis: Dr. X's computer designed to solve Technopolis's problems aims to expel all humans; Our heroes must rescue Princess Leonora from the Black Baron.
episodes.title: Mindnet / Tower Trouble

episodes.synopsis: The evil wizard Fourchesac uses a potion to switch places with King Kenric; Our heroes set off to find an ancestral sword to deliver to King Kenric.
episodes.title: I'm the King / Convoy of Honor

episodes.synopsis: Ruby tries to swipe some treasure from two fairies who are not what they seem; Ruby sets out to prove to Gene that humans are better than robots.
episodes.title: Turnips and Old Lace / Go Ruby!

episodes.synopsis: When a fairy witch turns Ruby into a dragon, her friends rush to help; a statue of the fairy queen is turning anyone who looks at her into a statue.
episodes.title: Rage of the Dragon / Silence of the Statues

episodes.synopsis: To rescue Alex from Baba Cara, our heroes must swipe Kenric's sacred teapot; Twinkle gets hurt battling Baba Cara, and only magical honey will help.
episodes.title: Saving Prince Alexander / Some Like It Magical

episodes.synopsis: Ruby's after some pirate loot but must choose between the treasure and her friends; the robots in Dr. X's amusement park think they're real knights.
episodes.title: All That Glitters / The Metal Age

episodes.synopsis: Fourchesac's love potion turns Kingsland's citizens into hug-hungry zombies; Alex's friends think the prince has been turned into a white rabbit.
episodes.title: The Song of the Stork / The White Rabbit

episodes.synopsis: Our heroes help a fairy break an evil spell cast on her love; gravity's reversed in Technopolis, and our heroes must rush to prevent a catastrophe.
episodes.title: Lady Unicorn / Outlaws of Gravity

episodes.synopsis: Twinkle makes a mess when redecorating a throne room and gets a robot to clean up; the gang tries to stop the Black Baron from stealing a baby dragon.
episodes.title: A Robot at the Fairies / Baby Dragon

episodes.synopsis: The Black Baron schemes to lock up our heroes and take over Kingsland; Ruby can turn things to gold, so the pirates take a keen interest in her.
episodes.title: Operation Swashbuckler / The Goose with the Golden Eggs

episodes.synopsis: Twinkle casts a sleeping spell on a fierce dragon, but the spell hits Alex; the Dark Baron, Fourchesac and Baba Cara are hatching an evil scheme.
episodes.title: Sleeping Buddy / The Truce

episodes.synopsis: Little Ruby grows up among pirates and is determined to be one of them; trying to reach treasure inside a castle, Ruby must get past Ulf the Crusher.
episodes.title: Ruby, Queen of the Seas: Part 1 / Ruby, Queen of the Seas: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Sir Ulf helps Ruby learn how to handle weapons -- as well as the dances of the court; Ruby returns to Gunpowder Island only to battle Sharkbeard.
episodes.title: Ruby, Queen of the Seas: Part 3 / Ruby, Queen of the Seas: Part 4

episodes.synopsis: Scientist Gene yearns to explore the world, but the Great Computer forbids it; escaping on his exploration vehicle, Gene confronts a dragon and more.
episodes.title: Gene, Techno-Explorer: Part 1 / Gene,Techno-Explorer: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Gene teams with a fairy to defeat a furious troll; Gene halts his exploration to go save the scientists the Great Computer has put in a deep freeze.
episodes.title: Gene, Techno-Explorer: Part 3 / Gene,Techno-Explorer: Part 4

episodes.synopsis: Alex is ecstatic when an odd creature crash-lands in the kingdom and stirs things up; Alex's adventures with Alien take them to the Enchanted Island.
episodes.title: Origins: Part 1 / Origins: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Our heroes are captured by Sharkbeard and pretend they're pirates to escape; the gang lands on an island with dinosaurs and more Alien-like creatures.
episodes.title: Origins: Part 3 / Origins: Part 4
